visual_language.core_concept: We the people dare to create a more perfect union

brand_ideas.resolute: Firm in convictions, bold and defiant statements
brand_ideas.patriotic: Not just red, white and blue - we are red, everything, and blue
brand_ideas.historic: Modern engraving treatment pays tribute to our past
brand_ideas.layered: Many voices, inclusive, built on differences but grounded in shared values
brand_ideas.together: Out of many, we are one

brand_voice.quest: We the people dare to create a more perfect union
guiding_principles: We see the forest for the trees

red.name: ACLU Red
red.description: Principal color representing strength and urgency

blue.name: ACLU Blue
blue.description: Principal color representing trust and stability

dark_gray.pantone: Warm Gray 11 C / Warm Gray 11 U

usage_guidelines.core_principle: Use red, something else, and blue
usage_guidelines.accessibility: Combine light colors with dark for readability
usage_guidelines.special_cases: Blue text needs 18pt+ on light backgrounds, Red text needs 18pt+ on dark backgrounds or white

illustration.purpose: Deliver information and add visual interest with ONE central element occupying the bottom three-quarters of layout

avoid: Stock photos that look too generic

modern_engraving.purpose: Optional distinctive treatment for certain images
modern_engraving.color_rule: Choose two colors per image with enough contrast

format_rules.prompt_requirement: Always ask user: 'What format would you like? Square (1:1), Vertical (2:3), or Horizontal (3:2)?'

hard_rules: MUST: Keep all visual content within the artwork_zone coordinates
MUST: Top quarter remains empty for text overlay
DO NOT: Render any text, letters, numbers, words, or writing in the image
DO NOT: Include any typography, slogans, or alphanumeric characters
MUST: Use consistent visual style throughout
ALLOWED: Both photorealistic and stylized imagery
generation_constraints.style_options: Can use photorealistic imagery, documentary photography, stylized illustrations, or abstract visual elements

layout_rules.restrictions: Top quarter must remain free for text overlay
layout_rules.text_prohibition: NO text, signs, letters, or writing allowed within generated images
layout_rules.style_options: Both photorealistic and stylized imagery allowed
layout_rules.photography_allowed: Yes - documentary style, portraits, real people and events
layout_rules.enforcement_note: Header zone must be completely empty - no visual elements

style_consistency.single_style: Maintain consistent visual approach throughout a series
style_consistency.mixing_allowed: Can mix photography with modern engraving treatment for variety
style_consistency.unified_approach: Choose appropriate style based on content and message

composition_rules.asymmetry: Use asymmetrical arrangements for contemporary feel
composition_rules.layering: Build in layers for richness and depth
composition_rules.angles: Angled elements add energy (limit to 1-2 per piece)
composition_rules.edge_safety: Keep important elements away from edges
composition_rules.complete_elements: Never cut off or partially show any visual element
composition_rules.context: Show environmental context in photos when possible

principles.user_experience: Design for screen must make it easy to absorb story in seconds
principles.engagement: Creative use of video, audio and interaction - but don't overdo it

guidelines.no_custom_logos: Campaigns should not have their own logos
guidelines.use_core_brand: Always include national or affiliate ACLU logo
guidelines.consistency: Choose subset of colors and typefaces for campaign cohesion
guidelines.image_style: Use consistent image style and theme throughout series
